mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO Ship
`shipNo`, `shipFlag`, `shipType`, `shipLevel`, `length`, `width`, `depth`, `totalWeight`, `netWeight`, `loadWeight`,
`levelAWeight`, `levelBWeight`, `levelCWeight`, `buildDate`, `customerId`, `checkRegisterNo`,
`shipID`, `sailingArea`, `sailingAreaA`, `sailingAreaB`, `sailingAreaC`, `firstRegisterNo`,
`buildFactory`, `aisID`, `gpsDeviceId`, `oldShipName`, `runType`, `rebuildDate`,
`checkDate`, `repairDate`, `description`, `name`, `mobile`, `preLoad`, `identity`, `bankCardNo`, `bankName`, `idPhoto`, `idPhotoF`, `bankCardPhoto`, `shipPhoto`, `from`, `status`, `fitStatus`, `noFitCause`, `creator`, `updater`, `created`, `updated`
VALUES
#{pojo.shipNo}, #{pojo.shipFlag}, #{pojo.shipType}, #{pojo.shipLevel}, #{pojo.length}, #{pojo.width}, #{pojo.depth}, #{pojo.totalWeight}, #{pojo.netWeight}, #{pojo.loadWeight},
#{pojo.levelAWeight}, #{pojo.levelBWeight}, #{pojo.levelCWeight}, #{pojo.buildDate}, #{pojo.customerId}, #{pojo.checkRegisterNo},
#{pojo.shipID}, #{pojo.sailingArea}, #{pojo.sailingAreaA}, #{pojo.sailingAreaB}, #{pojo.sailingAreaC}, #{pojo.firstRegisterNo},
#{pojo.buildFactory}, #{pojo.aisID}, #{pojo.gpsDeviceId}, #{pojo.oldShipName}, #{pojo.runType}, #{pojo.rebuildDate},
#{pojo.checkDate}, #{pojo.repairDate}, #{pojo.description}, #{pojo.name}, #{pojo.mobile}, #{pojo.preLoad}, #{pojo.identity}, #{pojo.bankCardNo}, #{pojo.bankName}, #{pojo.idPhoto}, #{pojo.idPhotoF}, #{pojo.bankCardPhoto}, #{pojo.shipPhoto}, #{pojo.from}, #{pojo.status}, #{pojo.fitStatus}, #{pojo.noFitCause}, #{pojo.creator}, #{pojo.updater}, UNIX_TIMESTAMP(now()), UNIX_TIMESTAMP(now())
mapper.update:
UPDATE Ship
`shipNo` = #{pojo.shipNo}, `shipFlag`= #{pojo.shipFlag}, `shipType`= #{pojo.shipType}, `shipLevel`= #{pojo.shipLevel}, `length`= #{pojo.length}, `width`= #{pojo.width}, `depth`= #{pojo.depth}, `totalWeight`= #{pojo.totalWeight}, `netWeight`= #{pojo.netWeight}, `loadWeight`= #{pojo.loadWeight},
`levelAWeight`= #{pojo.levelAWeight}, `levelBWeight`= #{pojo.levelBWeight}, `levelCWeight`= #{pojo.levelCWeight}, `buildDate`= #{pojo.buildDate}, `customerId`= #{pojo.customerId}, `checkRegisterNo`= #{pojo.checkRegisterNo},
`shipID`= #{pojo.shipID}, `sailingArea`= #{pojo.sailingArea}, `sailingAreaA`= #{pojo.sailingAreaA}, `sailingAreaB`= #{pojo.sailingAreaB}, `sailingAreaC`= #{pojo.sailingAreaC}, `firstRegisterNo`= #{pojo.firstRegisterNo},
`buildFactory`= #{pojo.buildFactory}, `aisID`= #{pojo.aisID}, `gpsDeviceId`= #{pojo.gpsDeviceId}, `oldShipName`= #{pojo.oldShipName}, `runType`= #{pojo.runType}, `rebuildDate`= #{pojo.rebuildDate},
`checkDate`= #{pojo.checkDate}, `repairDate`= #{pojo.repairDate}, `description`= #{pojo.description}, `name`= #{pojo.name}, `mobile`= #{pojo.mobile}, `preLoad`= #{pojo.preLoad}, `identity`= #{pojo.identity}, `bankCardNo`= #{pojo.bankCardNo}, `bankName`= #{pojo.bankName}, `idPhoto`= #{pojo.idPhoto}, `idPhotoF`= #{pojo.idPhotoF}, `bankCardPhoto`= #{pojo.bankCardPhoto}, `shipPhoto`= #{pojo.shipPhoto}, `from`= #{pojo.from}, `status`= #{pojo.status}, `fitStatus`= #{pojo.fitStatus}, `noFitCause`= #{pojo.noFitCause}, `updater` = #{pojo.updater}, `updated` = UNIX_TIMESTAMP(now())
WHERE `id` = #{pojo.id} and `isDeleted` = 0 LIMIT 1
UPDATE Ship SET `isDeleted` = 1 , `updated` = UNIX_TIMESTAMP(now()) WHERE `id` = #{id} and `isDeleted` = 0 LIMIT 1
mapper.select: SELECT FROM `Ship` a LEFT JOIN `UserProfile` b on a.creator = b.id WHERE a.`id` = #{id} and a.`isDeleted` = 0 LIMIT 1

SELECT count(a.id) FROM `Ship` a LEFT JOIN `UserProfile` b on a.creator = b.id
limit 1

select from `Ship` a LEFT JOIN `UserProfile` b on a.creator = b.id
order by a.`created` desc
select count(1)

select
order by a.`shipFlag`
select count(distinct a.loadTime,a.orderId,b.goodsName,b.sender,c.name,b.receiver,d.preWeight,a.loadWeight,a.dischargeWeight,a.bucklePrice, d.actualTransferPrice)

select distinct a.id,a.loadTime, ( select shipNo from Ship b where b.id = a.shipId ) as shipNo, b.goodsName,b.sender,c.name,b.receiver,d.preWeight,a.loadWeight,a.dischargeWeight, d.actualTransferPrice,a.bucklePrice,a.cutWire,a.cutOther,a.allowance,a.balanceDate,a.dischargeDelayFee, (case when d.settleType='11' or d.settleType='12' then IFNULL(a.loadWeight*d.actualTransferPrice,0) else IFNULL(a.dischargeWeight*d.actualTransferPrice,0) end) as actualTransferMoney, (case when so.status=1 then IFNULL(po.preBuckleOil,0) else IFNULL(so.status*so.fuelQuantity,0) end) as shipOil, ((case when d.settleType='11' or d.settleType='12' then a.loadWeight*d.actualTransferPrice else a.dischargeWeight*d.actualTransferPrice end)+a.dischargeDelayFee+a.allowance-a.bucklePrice-a.cutWire-a.cutOther-(case when so.status=1 then IFNULL(po.preBuckleOil,0) else IFNULL(so.status*so.fuelQuantity,0) end)) BalanceMoney
select count(distinct a.loadTime,a.orderId,b.goodsName,b.sender,c.name,b.receiver,d.preWeight,a.loadWeight,a.dischargeWeight,a.bucklePrice, d.actualTransferPrice)

select distinct a.loadTime,a.orderId, ( select shipNo from Ship b where b.id = a.shipId ) as shipNo, b.goodsName,b.sender,c.name,b.receiver,d.preWeight,a.loadWeight,a.dischargeWeight, a.poundBalance,IFNULL(a.poundBalance/a.loadWeight,0) hs ,a.poundBalance- a.loadWeight*0.995 cchs, (SELECT p.name from Port p where p.id = b.startPortId) as portName, case when e.unitPrice is not null then e.unitPrice ELSE d.actualTransferPrice end as kpdj, (select p.planRefueling from PlanRefueling p where p.shipId = a.shipId and p.disId = a.orderId) as kcy , a.bucklePrice, (d.oil*( select so.unitPrice from ShipOil so where so.shipId = a.shipId and so.status='2') ) as shipOil, case when c.settleType ='11' or c.settleType = '12' then IFNULL(FORMAT((a.loadWeight*e.unitPrice),2),0) else IFNULL(FORMAT((a.dischargeWeight*e.unitPrice),2),0) end as kpje, d.actualTransferPrice as cydj, case when d.settleType='11' or d.settleType='12' then FORMAT(( d.actualTransferPrice*a.loadWeight-IFNULL(a.bucklePrice,0)-IFNULL((d.oil*( select so.unitPrice from ShipOil so where so.shipId = a.shipId and so.status='2') ),0) ), 2 ) else FORMAT(( d.actualTransferPrice*a.dischargeWeight-IFNULL(a.bucklePrice,0)-IFNULL((d.oil*( select so.unitPrice from ShipOil so where so.shipId = a.shipId and so.status='2') ),0) ), 2 ) end as cyje
select count(1)

select a.shipId,b.shipNo,a.preWeight,b.mobile,a.preArriveTime , (SELECT CASE when c.selfBuckle ='1' then '是' else '否' end from CustomerTaskFlow c where a.customerTaskFlowId = c.id) as selfBuckle
order by a.created DESC

select ta.shipNo ,GROUP_CONCAT(ta.sj) as sj, GROUP_CONCAT(ta.receiver) as receiver,GROUP_CONCAT(ta.sender) as sender,GROUP_CONCAT(ta.goodsType) as lx from ( select b.shipNo,date_format(FROM_UNIXTIME(a.loadTime),'%Y-%m-%d') as sj ,d.receiver,d.sender,d.goodsType from SailingInfo a, Ship b,DispatchInfo c,CustomerTaskFlow d where a.shipId = b.id and a.orderId = c.id and c.customerTaskFlowId =d.id and b.shipFlag = 1 and a.isDeleted = '0'
and FROM_UNIXTIME( a.actualArriveEPortTime, '%Y-%m' ) = #{pojo.key}
AND (b.`shipNo` like concat('%', #{pojo.name}, '%') )
ORDER BY a.shipId ) ta GROUP BY ta.shipNo order by count(ta.shipNo) desc LIMIT 1

select ta.shipNo ,GROUP_CONCAT(ta.sj) as sj, GROUP_CONCAT(ta.receiver) as receiver,GROUP_CONCAT(ta.sender) as sender,GROUP_CONCAT(ta.goodsType) as lx from ( select b.shipNo,date_format(FROM_UNIXTIME(a.loadTime),'%d') as sj ,d.receiver,d.sender,d.goodsType from SailingInfo a, Ship b,DispatchInfo c,CustomerTaskFlow d where a.shipId = b.id and a.orderId = c.id and c.customerTaskFlowId =d.id
and FROM_UNIXTIME(a.actualArriveEPortTime, '%Y-%m-%d' ) between date_add(date_add( str_to_date( #{pojo.key}, '%Y-%m-%d'), interval -1 month), interval 1 day ) and str_to_date( #{pojo.key}, '%Y-%m-%d')
AND (b.`shipNo` like concat('%', #{pojo.name}, '%') )
and b.shipFlag = 1 and a.isDeleted = '0' ORDER BY a.shipId ) ta GROUP BY ta.shipNo order by count(ta.shipNo) desc
mapper.sql:
from DispatchInfo a LEFT JOIN Ship b on a.shipId = b.id where a.isDeleted ='0'
AND (b.`shipNo` like concat('%', #{pojo.key}, '%') )
mapper.select: SELECT (select sp.shipNo from Ship sp where sp.id = a.shipId) as shipId, CASE a.eventId WHEN 1 THEN '不接电话（次）' WHEN 2 THEN '停船过夜（次）' WHEN 3 THEN '不服调配（次）' WHEN 4 THEN '修船（天）' WHEN 5 THEN '保养（天）' WHEN 6 THEN '事故停航（天）' WHEN 7 THEN '私事停航（天）' WHEN 8 THEN '春节放假（天）' WHEN 9 THEN '装卸货异常情况（天）' ELSE '' END as eventId , CASE IFNULL(c.sl,0) WHEN 0 THEN '-' ELSE c.sl END as sl,e.zs ,b.bz FROM ( ( SELECT s.shipId, t.eventId FROM ( SELECT 1 AS eventId FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 2 AS eventId FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 3 AS eventId FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 4 AS eventId FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 5 AS eventId FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 6 AS eventId FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 7 AS eventId FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 8 AS eventId FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 9 AS eventId FROM DUAL ) t, ShipEvent s WHERE 1=1 and s.isDeleted = 0 and ( s.beginDate between date_add(date_add( str_to_date(#{0}, '%Y-%m-%d'), interval -1 month), interval 1 day ) and str_to_date(#{1}, '%Y-%m-%d') or s.endDate between date_add(date_add( str_to_date(#{2}, '%Y-%m-%d'), interval -1 month), interval 1 day ) and str_to_date(#{3}, '%Y-%m-%d') ) group by s.shipId, t.eventId ORDER BY s.shipId, t.eventId ) a LEFT JOIN (select shipId,eventId,case when eventId ='1' or eventId ='2' or eventId ='3' then SUM(dayNum) else sum(getdays(date_format(beginDate, '%Y-%m-%d'),date_format(endDate, '%Y-%m-%d') ,#{4}) ) end as sl from ShipEvent where 1=1 and isDeleted = 0 and ( beginDate between date_add(date_add( str_to_date(#{5}, '%Y-%m-%d'), interval -1 month), interval 1 day ) and str_to_date(#{6}, '%Y-%m-%d') or endDate between date_add(date_add( str_to_date(#{7}, '%Y-%m-%d'), interval -1 month), interval 1 day ) and str_to_date(#{8}, '%Y-%m-%d') ) GROUP BY shipId,eventId ORDER BY shipId,eventId) c ON (a.shipId = c.shipId) and a.eventId = c.eventId ) LEFT JOIN (select shipId, GROUP_CONCAT(description) AS bz from ShipEvent where isDeleted = 0 group by shipId )b on a.shipId = b.shipId LEFT JOIN (select count(shipId) as zs,shipId from SailingInfo where ( date_format(FROM_UNIXTIME(arriveSPortTime), '%Y-%m-%d') between date_add(date_add( str_to_date(#{9}, '%Y-%m-%d'), interval -1 month), interval 1 day ) and str_to_date(#{10}, '%Y-%m-%d') or date_format(FROM_UNIXTIME(arriveSPortTime), '%Y-%m-%d') between date_add(date_add( str_to_date(#{11}, '%Y-%m-%d'), interval -1 month), interval 1 day ) and str_to_date(#{12}, '%Y-%m-%d') )GROUP BY shipId ) e on a.shipId =e.shipId order by a.shipId ,a.eventId
select f.id as id ,f.name as name from Flow f, ContractFlow c where c.contractId = #{0} and c.flowId = f.id

select '集装箱' as lx, case when ta.jhsl is null then '-' else ta.jhsl end as jhsl, case when tb.sjsl is null then '-' else tb.sjsl end as sjsl, case when ta.jhsl is null or tb.sjsl is null then '-' else CONCAT(FORMAT(tb.sjsl/10000 /ta.jhsl *100,2) , '%') end as wcl from (select sum(plan) as jhsl, '3' as lx from FreightPlan where time = #{0} and shipFlag ='3' and isDeleted = '0' ) ta , (select sum(dischargeWeight) as sjsl ,'3' as lx from CustomerTaskFlow a , DispatchInfo b , SailingInfo c where b.customerTaskFlowId = a.id and c.orderId = b.id and a.goodsType = '3' and c.isDeleted = '0' and FROM_UNIXTIME( c.dischargeTime, '%Y-%m' ) = #{1} ) tb where ta.lx = tb.lx

select CASE tt.lx WHEN 1 THEN '碎石' WHEN 2 THEN '市场煤炭' WHEN 3 THEN '华能电煤' WHEN 4 THEN '浙能电煤' WHEN 5 THEN '铜精矿' WHEN 6 THEN 'PAT' WHEN 7 THEN '经营业务' WHEN 8 THEN '其他业务' ELSE '' END as lx , case when tb.jhsl is null then '-' else tb.jhsl end as jhsl, case when tt.sjsl is null then '-' else tt.sjsl end as sjsl, case when tb.jhsl is null or tt.sjsl is null then '-' else CONCAT(FORMAT(tt.sjsl /10000/tb.jhsl*100,2) , '%') end as wcl from ( select t.lx, ta.sjsl from (SELECT 1 AS lx FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 2 AS lx FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 3 AS lx FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 4 AS lx FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 5 AS lx FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 6 AS lx FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 7 AS lx FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 8 AS lx FROM DUAL ) t LEFT JOIN (select sum(dischargeWeight) as sjsl ,a.goodsSubType as lx from CustomerTaskFlow a , DispatchInfo b , SailingInfo c where b.customerTaskFlowId = a.id and c.orderId = b.id and a.goodsType = '2' and c.isDeleted = '0' and FROM_UNIXTIME( c.dischargeTime, '%Y-%m' ) = #{0} group by a.goodsSubType) ta on t.lx = ta.lx ) tt LEFT JOIN (select sum(plan) as jhsl, goodsName lx from FreightPlan where time = #{1} and shipFlag ='2' and isDeleted = '0' group by goodsName) tb on tt.lx = tb.lx order by tt.lx

select tb.lx as lx , case when tb.jhsl is null then '-' else tb.jhsl end as jhsl, case when tb.sjsl is null then '-' else tb.sjsl end as sjsl, case when tb.jhsl is null or tb.sjsl is null then '-' else CONCAT(FORMAT((tb.sjsl/10000/tb.jhsl )*100,2) , '%') end as wcl from ( select a.lx ,b.jhsl ,a.sjsl from ( select sum(dischargeWeight) as sjsl ,a.receiver as lx from CustomerTaskFlow a , DispatchInfo b , SailingInfo c where b.customerTaskFlowId = a.id and c.orderId = b.id and a.goodsType = '1' and c.isDeleted = '0' and FROM_UNIXTIME( c.dischargeTime, '%Y-%m' ) = #{0} group by a.receiver ) a left join (select sum(plan) as jhsl, revUnit lx from FreightPlan where time = #{1} and shipFlag ='1' and isDeleted = '0' group by revUnit ) b on a.lx = b.lx UNION select b.lx ,b.jhsl ,a.sjsl from ( select sum(dischargeWeight) as sjsl ,a.receiver as lx from CustomerTaskFlow a , DispatchInfo b , SailingInfo c where b.customerTaskFlowId = a.id and c.orderId = b.id and a.goodsType = '1' and c.isDeleted = '0' and FROM_UNIXTIME( c.dischargeTime, '%Y-%m' ) = #{2} group by a.receiver ) a right join (select sum(plan) as jhsl, revUnit lx from FreightPlan where time = #{3} and shipFlag ='1' and isDeleted = '0' group by revUnit ) b on a.lx = b.lx ) tb

select CASE tt.lx WHEN 1 THEN '650吨以上' WHEN 2 THEN '650吨以下' WHEN 3 THEN '碎石船' WHEN 4 THEN '兴能散装船' WHEN 5 THEN '兴能集装箱船' WHEN 6 THEN '兴一航运散装船' WHEN 7 THEN '兴一航运集装箱船' END as lx , case when tb.jhsl is null then '-' else tb.jhsl end as jhsl, case when tt.sjsl is null then '-' else tt.sjsl end as sjsl, case when tb.jhsl is null or tt.sjsl is null then '-' else CONCAT(FORMAT(tt.sjsl/tb.jhsl *100,2) , '%') end as wcl from ( select t.lx, FORMAT(ta.sjsl/tc.shipSum,2) as sjsl from (SELECT 1 AS lx FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 2 AS lx FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 3 AS lx FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 4 AS lx FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 5 AS lx FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 6 AS lx FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 7 AS lx FROM DUAL ) t LEFT JOIN ( select count(a.id) as sjsl ,b.shipLevel as lx from SailingInfo a ,Ship b where a.shipId = b.id and a.isDeleted = '0' and FROM_UNIXTIME( a.loadTime, '%Y-%m' ) = #{0} group by b.shipLevel ) ta on t.lx = ta.lx LEFT JOIN ( select count(distinct a.shipId) as shipSum ,b.shipLevel as lx from SailingInfo a ,Ship b where a.shipId = b.id and a.isDeleted = '0' and FROM_UNIXTIME( a.loadTime, '%Y-%m' ) = #{0} group by b.shipLevel
) tc on t.lx = tc.lx ) tt LEFT JOIN (select sum(plan) as jhsl, shipClass lx from ShippingPlan where time = #{1} and isDeleted = '0' group by shipClass) tb on tt.lx = tb.lx order by tt.lx
mapper.sql:
from `Ship` a left join `ShipStaff` b on b.shipId = a.id and b.isDeleted = 0 and b.isOwner = 1 and a.runType!=2 where a.isDeleted = 0
AND (a.`shipNo` like concat('%', #{pojo.key}, '%') )
AND `shipFlag` in
#{shipFlag}
AND a.`id` not in (select shipId from `DispatchInfo` c where c.isDeleted = 0 and c.`customerTaskFlowId` = #{pojo.customerTaskFlowId}) and case when shipFlag=3 then 1=1 else a.sailingArea & (select sailingArea from CustomerTaskFlow where id = #{pojo.customerTaskFlowId}) > 0 end

when.test: pojo.startRow != null and pojo.startRow gt -1 and pojo.limitNum != null and pojo.limitNum gt 0

mapper.select: SELECT A1.shipNo, A1.`name`, A1.mobile, A1.identity, A1.bankCardNo, A1.bankName, A1.idPhoto, A1.idPhotoF, A1.bankCardPhoto, A1.shipPhoto, A1.preLoad,A2.id FROM Ship A1 INNER JOIN AppUser A2 ON A1.id=A2.shipInfoId WHERE A2.id = #{id}
SELECT A1.`id` , A1.shipNo FROM Ship A1 INNER JOIN UserProfile A2 ON A1.mobile=A2.mobile WHERE A2.id = #{id}
